system.effect: Change Heavy Bolter Profile to (Heavy, Range 80m, S/-/-, 3d10 X, Pen 6, Blast(5), Corrosive, Smoke(1), Toxic(3)) When a creature begins their turn within the Smoke of the Smoke Quality, they take 2d10 I Damage with Corrosive and Toxic(3).
